name: Asteriot
description:
Its the year 2080. Development has reached higher, just like the buildings. There is however a problem, The asteroid belt has set free of its field, You as a part of the   ISO are forced by the UN Which has almost ceased to exist, to repel these with your rocket OBJECTIVE Fire bullets through your turret to save humanity. Save Humanity, Thats your goal CONTROLS PC :- Move The Rocket :-  WASD or The arrow keys Fire :- Spacebar RECOMMENDED SPECS CPU - Anything more than 1.5HZ RAM - 2GB Or More SOUND  - Any Windows Sound Driver Compatitable Driver

 

CONTACT          tapgamesofficial@gmail.com                                                   REMEMBER To err is human.
